ai-patthana9.9:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 4.)
ai-patthana9.9:0.3_0: Here it’s skilled in the articulate, and skilled in digging.
ai-patthana9.9:1.1_0: (This should not be expanded as in the teachings.)
ai-patthana9.9:2.1_0: (This should not be expanded as with the unconditioned.)
ai-patthana9.9:3.1_0: (This should not be expanded in brief.)
ai-patthana9.9:4.1_0: Three on taking pleasure, relying on one side, the three supports ...
ai-patthana9.9:7.1_0: (This should not be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana9.9:8.1_0: For the sake of letting go of negligence ...
ai-patthana9.9:9.1_0: (This should not be expanded in brief.)
ai-patthana9.9:10.1_0: That is the cause, based on the five reasons, relying on letting go, five lower fetters are not rid of greed, hate, and delusion.
ai-patthana9.9:11.1_1: and no matter what is unskillful.
